name: Linear Search
description: A simple search algorithm that sequentially checks each element of a list until the desired element is found or the list ends.

name: Binary Search
description: An efficient search algorithm for sorted lists that repeatedly divides the search interval in half to locate the target element.

name: Hash Table
description: A data structure that stores key-value pairs and allows fast retrieval using a hash function to compute an index for each key.

name: Breadth-First Search
description: An algorithm for traversing or searching graph data structures, exploring all neighbors of a node before moving to the next level of nodes.
